title: reflect: document behaviour of Caller/FuncForPC/FileLine better
body:
See discussion here https://groups.google.com/d/topic/golang-nuts/f2jraM5Hpu0/discussion

The pc values returned by runtime.Callers may, via FuncForPC and FileLine, give an
incorrect, later, line in the Go source. This can be fixed by subtracting 1 from the pc
(or simply using runtime.Caller).

Rob has said that the documentation is inadequate.

I have a reproducer, but it is not small and though I have tried to create a smaller one
I have not been successful.
